duties_responsibilities.duty: Register, label, retrieve, and discard biological and production materials in accordance with SOPs and regulatory requirements.
Maintain appropriate temperatures for materials and handle materials with the required safety measures.
Utilize the Company Inventory Management System for sample handling tasks and maintain chain of custody and audit trails.
Perform quality control checks and investigate/document issues encountered in material handling.
Assist with facility upkeep and freezer maintenance as assigned.
Work in an area with potentially infectious materials and maintain a clean work environment while following Universal Precautions for bloodborne pathogens.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree OR HS Diploma + 2 years relevant experience OR six months' demonstrated proficiency as a Biobank Assistant.
